title: AFK Ban not working??
body: I left a game because of my internet connection, but im not complaining about that. After 20 mins of waiting it sends me back to the home screen, i've been trying for 4 times and its still doing the same. How am i supposed to play and end the ban if i cant even start the game???  Pleas fix this!!

replies.body: It sounds like your internet connection might still have issues, so it's unable to get you through the matchmaking service.  Start off with the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to see if that helps!
